properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed for handling the boolean sort
properties.entry: (declare-fun u2b (U) Bool) (declare-fun b2u (Bool) U) (declare-const sort_boolean T) (declare-const TRUE U) (declare-const FALSE U)

(assert (forall ((b Bool)) (= (u2b (b2u b)) b))) (assert (= (typeof TRUE) sort_boolean)) (assert (= (typeof FALSE) sort_boolean)) (assert (forall ((u U)) (=> (= (typeof u) sort_boolean) (or (= u TRUE) (= u FALSE))))) (assert (u2b TRUE)) (assert (not (u2b FALSE)))
